overview:
Alex Bugeja is a serial entrepreneur who was formerly involved in the semiconductor business and subsequently in online advertising and ecommerce when he founded the business that would later become Traffikoo LLC in 2005. Traffikoo is a successful boutique online advertising firm that now serves thousands of clients in the US, Europe, and worldwide; its clients range from niche online merchants to Fortune 500 corporations.

Prior to Traffikoo, Dr Bugeja founded Engim, Inc. a venture-backed wireless semiconductor company in the Boston area, where he served as Chief Technology Officer from 2001 â€“ 2004. Before Engim, he was with Texas Instruments, Dallas, Texas as a senior design engineer. He graduated with a first class honors BEng degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Malta in 1994, an SM degree in Engineering Sciences from Harvard University in 1996, and a PhD degree in Electrical & Computer Engineering from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 2000. He is also the holder of eleven US patents.

Dr Bugeja currently lives in Dallas, Texas, and is both a citizen of the US and the EU.
